comments.html: Should it be concerning that the first "What's New" item listed in the vCNS 5.5 release notes is something designed to help you with kernel crashes?
comments.name: Unknown

comments.html: Hi Ivan, about the ridiculous pricing and licensing rumors. I can confirm that the default pricing is ridiculous but VMware are very open to talk because i think they are trying to find the right pricepoint.  The worst about the licensing model is that you DONT get vspp atm, so no help on growing your partner status....
comments.name: Unknown
